channel.title: [317 Deltascape] Adding Custom Items [Help]
channel.description:
Hey, guys i am new i really cross my heart don't know where to put this, i just joined 2 weeks ago, but this is my first time logging on.
I have a Very clean Delicate Delta [317] that has no custom items, i wanted to know how to add custom items. What section ( i know class8.java.) but when i added it i get errors, i finally managed to put it on the right spot i compiled, but when i log on i get black screen and can't log out or log in, when i delete it and compile it works?
[Please Help] Sorry if it is in the wrong spot.

item.title: [317 Deltascape] Adding Custom Items [Help]
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

Its wrong section but never mind.
Use class8.java and load your models to your models file.

if(i == ####) // ITEMID { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "OPTION";//New option class8.anInt174 = ####; //Model ID class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = ####; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = ####; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = ####; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = ####; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = ####; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = ####; class8.anInt165 = ####;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = ####;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = ####; class8.anInt175 = ####;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = ####;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = ####;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = " ####";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = " ####".getBytes();//DESCRIPTION }

Read full topic
